course_title: Determinants of Health & Health Promotion: BSN
class_notes: This section is for BSN traditional semester 1 students only. This course contains a clinical component. Clinical may be scheduled any day not in lecture, including weekends except 12 hours.
course_description: Students are introduced to concepts for achieving/maintaining quality of life and well-being across the lifespan. The course will examine determinants of health, health promotion and¿prevention, health education, and literacy to develop healthy lifestyles.¿
sections: Class Nbr: 5286, Section #: 100, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 8:30-9:50a, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
